name: Clockwork castle
description: In a land far far away a tyrant rules with the power of time on his side. Literally he’s a clock. He and his grunts have plagued the land and made it desolate. Our hero Joe has to defeat him with the power of ramen and mini gun on his side.  Our hero arrives at the castle of the tyrant, and makes his way through the treacherous underground lair. Will he find him or will he meet his doom. Just remember there is more than what meets the “eye”.
